annotations.kubernetes.io/limit-ranger: LimitRanger plugin set: cpu, memory request for container sidecar; cpu, memory limit for container sidecar; cpu, memory request for init container tuning; cpu, memory limit for init container tuning; cpu, memory request for init container set-tiered-storage-cache-dir-ownership; cpu, memory limit for init container set-tiered-storage-cache-dir-ownership; cpu, memory request for init container redpanda-configurator; cpu, memory limit for init container redpanda-configurator

command:
set -e
RESULT=$(curl --silent --fail -k -m 5  "http://${SERVICE_NAME}.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644/v1/status/ready")
echo $RESULT
echo $RESULT | grep ready
timeout -v 45 bash -x /var/lifecycle/postStart.sh 2>&1 | sed "s/^/lifecycle-hook post-start $(date): /" | tee /proc/1/fd/1; true
timeout -v 45 bash -x /var/lifecycle/preStop.sh 2>&1 | sed "s/^/lifecycle-hook pre-stop $(date): /" | tee /proc/1/fd/1; true
